ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Blade of Fiery Lamentations
ygData.msgSnippet: I haven t Tested it per se, but I do seem to notice fewer missed notes when I have my equipment on (as opposed to fighting naked on a CR) so I suspect it s
ygData.messageBody:
I haven't "Tested" it per se, but I do seem to notice fewer missed notes
when I have my equipment on (as opposed to fighting naked on a CR) so I
suspect it's true.

But I've done no official "Testing" yet, nor will I. I'm not that
analytical. To me it's a game to be played for fun. I leave the testing to
those inclined to do it ;)

Lyrnia Jongleur
Bard of Norrath

Subject: RE: [eqbards] Blade of Fiery Lamentations


> we've all heard this. has anyone tested it?
